SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Discovers a Sea Resource. Can only be used in a City with a Harbor, that has Coast nearby without a Bonus resource yet.
[ICON_BULLET]Discovers a Mining Resource. Requires a Hill
[ICON_BULLET]Discovers a Mana Node. Cannot be used 5 tiles close to another mana Node.
[ICON_BULLET]Increases Faith by 2500. Can only be performed in the Holy City
